value.displayName: Propensity to adverse reaction to drug

act.text: Possible flu-like symptoms for three days.

tr.td: Consultation with Dr George Potomac for Asthma

act.text: Follow up with Dr George Potomac for Asthma

text.paragraph: Follow up with Dr George Potomac for Asthma

text.content: Ms. Jones, you have been seen by Dr. Henry Seven at Local Community Hospital from August 8th until August 13th 2012. You are currently being discharged from Local Community Hospital. Dr. Seven has provided the following instructions to you at this time; should you have any questions please contact a member of your healthcare team prior to discharge. If you have left the hospital and have questions, please contact Dr. Seven at 555-555-1002. Instructions:

list.item: Please monitor your peak flows. If your peak flows drop to 50% of normal, call my office immediately or return to the Emergency Room.

If you experience any of the following symptoms, call my office immediately or return to the Emergency Room:
Shortness of Breath
Dizziness or Light-headedness
Fever, chills, or diffuse body aches
Pain or redness at the site of any previous intravenous catheter
Any other unusual problem
